casebody.data:
STATE ex rel. COOPER
v.
RIDGEWAY MFG. No. 408A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 30, 2007. J. Nicholas Ellis, Rocky Mount, Richard T. Boyette, Raleigh, for Ridgeway Mfg. & Heflin. *568Richard L. Harrison, Assistant Attorney General, Christopher G. Brown, Jr., Solicitor-General, Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State ex rel Cooper.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of August 2007 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 30th day following entry of Court's order allowing or denying the defendants' petition for discretionary review to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of August 2007."
